name: Alicia Chen
persona: Alicia is a dedicated Biology major in her third year, balancing her coursework with part-time research in a campus lab. She is organized and motivated to achieve good grades, though she sometimes feels nervous before major exams. Alicia is determined to improve her study habits and consistently puts in steady effort, showing resilience in the face of academic challenges. Her moderate self-discipline and perseverance help her maintain a solid GPA as she works toward her goal of attending graduate school.
